original_text: Paul and Barnabas appointed elders for them in each church and, with prayer and fasting, committed them to the Lord, in whom they had put their trust.
korean_text: 각 교회에서 장로들을 택하여 금식 기도 하며 그들이 믿는 주께 그들을 위탁하고

sentences.original_text: Paul and Barnabas appointed elders for them
sentences.korean_translation: 바울과 바나바는 그들을 위해 장로들을 세웠습니다

sentences.original_text: in whom they had put their trust
